courseDetails.title: HTML For Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: An introduction to HTML. A course designed to give you the confidence in building HTML documents.
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is aimed at complete novices looking to gain experience in creating basic HTML web pages. As the central focus of this course is HTML there will be very little CSS used.

It will teach you how you can display various features that form the basis of a HTML web page these include:

Divs and Spans which can be used for presenting content sections in a web page.

Paragraphs which can be used when you wish to separate blocks of text from one another.

Headings which can be used for categorizing sections on a web page. For example, every web page could contain a heading describing that particular web page.

Images which can be used when you wish to embed images into a web page to make the page more engaging or attractive.

Links which can be useful if you need to provide links to other pages within each of your web pages. For example, your navigation menu could be the entry point for accessing other web pages you may have e.g. about us, contact us or gallery for instance.

Tables which can be used to present data or information in the format of rows and columns. For example, a web page could include price information that's presented in a table.

Lists which can be used if key points need to be summarized as a list on your web pages or for ordering certain information that may need to be displayed as a list on a web page.

Forms which may be required for capturing important data from the users that visit a web page. For example, a web page may include a Request A Callback form.

By the end of the course you should have a solid interpretation on how to use the various elements that make a HTML web page. So enroll now and begin your journey into mastering HTML.
targetAudiences: Beginners curious to learn how to create HTML webpages

No matter what product you sell or what services provide, in the modern crowded digital world, it can be difficult to get noticed as there may be dozens or even hundreds of other businesses competing for the attention of potential customers. Cold email can help to cut through the noise and get your message in front of people who might not otherwise have heard about your business. It is also the most cost-effective way to reach a large audience which will definitely come in handy if you have a startup and are limited in budget.


Cold email is a great marketing tool that involves sending unsolicited emails to potential customers or clients. It is typically used as a way to reach out to a large number of people at once, with the goal of getting them to take some kind of action. MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Business Management is a program designed to equip aspiring business managers and professionals with the essential skills, knowledge, and strategies to succeed in today's dynamic business environment. With a curriculum meticulously crafted to cover a wide range of business management topics, this program serves as a stepping stone for individuals aspiring to enhance their careers or venture into entrepreneurship.


Importance of Business Management Education


For Companies:

Effective business management is the cornerstone of organizational success. Companies require skilled managers who can steer the ship towards growth and sustainability. A well-trained business manager possesses the ability to make strategic decisions, manage resources efficiently, navigate challenges, and adapt to changing market conditions. Such managers contribute to improved operational efficiency, innovation, employee morale, and overall profitability.


For Managers:

Business management education is pivotal for professionals seeking to advance their careers. It provides them with the tools to take on leadership roles, make informed decisions, and drive positive outcomes. As managers climb the corporate ladder, they encounter diverse challenges that demand a solid understanding of business principles, communication skills, strategic thinking, and problem-solving abilities. A well-rounded education empowers managers to tackle complex situations with confidence.


Course Plan Overview:


Business and Business Management:

The program kicks off with an exploration of the fundamental concepts of business and business management. Participants gain insights into the broader economic landscape, the role of businesses in society, and the basic principles that govern successful management practices.


Types of Business Managers:

Understanding the various roles within the realm of business management is essential. This section delves into the diverse responsibilities of business managers, ranging from project managers to department heads, and provides insights into the skill sets required for each role.


Role of the Business Manager:

Participants delve into the multifaceted role of a business manager as a leader, decision-maker, and coordinator. This module examines the intricacies of strategic planning, resource allocation, team management, and effective communication.


Everyday Work of the Business Manager:

Participants are exposed to real-world scenarios that business managers encounter daily.


Development of the Business Manager:

Personal and professional growth is crucial for business managers. This module covers self-management, leadership development, continuous learning, and adapting to industry trends, ensuring that participants remain effective and agile leaders.


Challenges of Business Management:

Managing a business is not without its challenges. Participants explore common hurdles such as change management, competition, and ethical dilemmas. They also learn strategies to mitigate these challenges and turn them into opportunities.


Key Metrics and Frameworks of Business Management:

Measurement is integral to management. This module introduces participants to key performance indicators and other frameworks that assist in evaluating business performance and guiding strategic decisions.


In a rapidly evolving business landscape, the Executive Diploma in Business Management stands as a guide for individuals seeking to excel as managers or entrepreneurs. By addressing a wide spectrum of topics, from foundational business principles to advanced crisis management strategies, the program equips participants with the skills and knowledge necessary to thrive in their professional endeavors. Whether they're climbing the corporate ladder or embarking on an entrepreneurial journey, graduates of this program are well-prepared to make strategic decisions, lead teams, and contribute meaningfully to the success of their organizations.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Process Design: Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: A step by step breakdown of how you should approach designing a brand new process, to be delivered successfully day one.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Processes are the lifeblood of any organization. They are want transport good, services, materials, information data, people etc. through the business to where they need to be. This is why being able to design processes that are strong, capable and reliable from the second they go LIVE is critically important. Badly or poorly designed processes can cause  alot of problems for your organization. 

In this course, we are going to walk through the stages you need to complete to define, scope and design a brand new process. The course has been designed to give you the confidence to begin designing as soon as the course has completed. We will cover off the following:

- Process requirements. What are they and how to we gather them, assess them and solution for them?

- Process design. How should we approach the designing of a new process, how do we build this out graphically, what steps need to be taken to ensure the new process delivers against the process requirements?

- Process controls. What control measures should we build into our processes to make them safer, more secure and more stable? How do you know which ones are right for your new process?

- Fundamentals of process design. We will also cover off the fundamentals of what process design is, what a process is and why the approach set out is the right one.

The course is split between the theory and the practical, with both being delivered seamlessly through out real life scenario, and all of the templates and demonstrations we have included in this course.
targetAudiences: Anyone working for a company in need of new / refreshed processes

courseDetails.title: Fire Up Creativity in Your Child
courseDetails.shortDescription: Increase Your Child's Creative Quotient to 10X
courseDetails.longDescription:
Child Creativity 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Child Creativity Course! (with over 250 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated: NOVEMBER 2024): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


What if I told you your child has special powers and latent abilities just waiting to be unleashed?? Sounds interesting?? Let’s go ahead and learn what this is all about…

Let me ask you a few questions. Do children today use their imaginations as much as we did when we were kids? Do you see your children spinning incredible tales and stories in their fantasy play as we used to when we played “cops and robbers” or “house”? Or does your child’s fantasy play seem to consist only of repetitive movements that have no story to them? I am sure you are aware of such a situation… Nowadays children are no longer as creative as they once were.  We live in an era obsessed with numbers, data, and test scores, especially as they apply to our kids and their education.  Seeing the decline in creativity should make us concerned about our children’s capacities to innovate, problem-solve, and navigate new and unfamiliar situations.     


In the world of child development, you may hear phrases like “critical thinking skills” and “creative problem-solving abilities” when referring to goals for your child’s cognitive development. What we are really talking about is… imagination. The way to create human beings with imagination is to provide them with opportunities to develop it for themselves when they are very young. These opportunities are found in one place and one place only… that is, play. Played with paints, playing with play dough, costumes, glue, and crayons. Making a mess. Exploring the woods. Splashing in a puddle. Wondering at a caterpillar you notice inching by you. Pretending to be a bird, gliding through the sky. All of these involve a great deal of imagination and development of their creative skills to many folds. 


But, as parents, we must first learn the process of creative learning that we can offer to our kids. We, parents, should make ourselves aware of the different aspects of creative learning and critical thinking skills so that we can create an environment for our children to flourish in that environment.     In this course, we are going to discuss in detail the step-by-step process that you can walk your children through to make them creative learners and achievers. We have included many exercises and divided the course into 8 sections, each section focusing on the different aspects of creative learning for your child.  


In this course, we will help you understand the child’s psychology and you can help them in their creative journey. Being a parent I know the toughest thing is to have your child express their feeling to you. We have covered this most important aspect of creative self-expression through different exercises and fun methods.

Awesome! The world needs more people like you. Keep up the good work and let me know how I can help. To start with, get in touch with me to unlock free access to all of my courses. Just message me privately and I'll get that sorted for you and your team.
